item.title: Suggested Readings, Links, Podcasts and other Sundry Items for the Burgeoning Cloud Architect
item.description: Here I present a list of resources I have used or am curretnly using to further my knowldege in the Application Architecture space with a purposeful focus on Cloud Native developement and Distributed Systems design. I would love to hear of other resources, you my reader, may have found useful in your journey in Modern Application design. Readings Books Designing Distributed Systems, Brendan Burns ISBN-13: 978-1491983645 Multi-Cloud Architecture and Governance: Leverage Azure, AWS, GCP, and VMware vSphere to build effective multi-cloud solutions, Jeroen Mulder ISBN-13: 978-1800203198 Solutions Architect’s Handbook: Kick-start your career as a solutions architect by learning architecture design principles and strategies, 2nd Edition, Saurabh Shrivastava, Neelanjali Srivastav ISBN-13: 978-1801816618 Designing Data-Intensive Applications: The Big Ideas Behind Reliable, Scalable, and Maintainable Systems, Martin Kleppmann ISBN-13: 978-1449373320 Architecting Cloud Computing Solutions: Build cloud strategies that align technology and economics while effectively managing risk, Kevin L.
